page.title: 02A DAY ON MY FARM
page.content: A good day on my farm would be to get up at half past 6 in the morning get dressed and go down stairs.I have breakfast and a cup of tea. Then I would go out and help my Dad milk the cows. When he has finished milking I help my Dad to take the cows out, come back and wait for Dad to have his breakfast. We go down and look at the sheep and then go and shift the electric fence for the cows. Then we get the milking gear ready for the evening. By then it would be dinner time. After a dinner of sandwiches and wafers, I would go outside and ask my Dad if he would get my pony Ned in for me. My Dad gets my pony in and we go out riding. Then Dad and I go and get the cows. I ride Ned and my Dad has to walk.
